languages.text: Массивные трансформаторы, когитаторы, ящики и вокс-станции занимали большую часть пространства. На их фоне странным образом выделялась конструкция в центре — огромная линза, водруженная на подставку, ловила тонкие лучи солнца, что пробивались сквозь щели в потолке и рассекали полумрак помещения.

traits.locale_text: Массивные трансформаторы, когитаторы, ящики и вокс-станции занимали большую часть пространства. На их фоне странным образом выделялась конструкция в центре — огромная линза, водруженная на подставку, ловила тонкие лучи солнца, что пробивались сквозь щели в потолке и рассекали полумрак помещения.

languages.text: Bulky power transformers, cogitators, crates, and vox-casters took up most of the space. Against their background, the structure in the centre stood out oddly: an enormous lens mounted on a stand. It caught the thin sunbeams that made their way through slits in the ceiling and crossed the half-lit room.
languages.original_text: Массивные трансформаторы, когитаторы, ящики и вокс-станции занимали большую часть пространства. На их фоне странным образом выделялась конструкция в центре — огромная линза, водруженная на подставку, ловила тонкие лучи солнца, что пробивались сквозь щели в потолке и рассекали полумрак помещения.

traits.locale_text: Bulky power transformers, cogitators, crates, and vox stations took up most of the space in the room. Against their background, the structure in the centre stood out oddly: an enormous lens mounted on a stand. It caught the thin sunbeams that made their way through slits in the ceiling and crossed the half-lit room.

Against their background, the structure in the centre stood out oddly: an enormous lens mounted on a stand. It caught the thin sunbeams that made their way through slits in the ceiling and crossed the half-lit room.

It caught the thin sunbeams that made their way through slits in the ceiling and crossed the half-lit room.

Bulky power transformers, cogitators, crates, and vox-casters took up most of the space. Against their background, the structure in the centre stood out oddly: an enormous lens mounted on a stand. It caught the thin sunbeams that made their way through slits in the ceiling and crossed the half-lit room.

Bulky power transformers, cogitators, crates, and vox-casters took up most of the space. Against their background, the structure in the centre stood out oddly: an enormous lens mounted on a stand. It caught the thin sunbeams that made their way through slits in the ceiling and crossed the half-lit room.

Bulky power transformers, cogitators, crates, and vox-casters took up most of the space. Against their background, the structure in the centre stood out oddly: an enormous lens mounted on a stand. It caught the thin sunbeams that made their way through slits in the ceiling and crossed the half-lit room.

languages.text: Klobige Stromtransformatoren, Cogitatoren, Kisten und Vox-Transmitter belegten fast die gesamte Fläche. Vor diesem Hintergrund stach das Gebilde in der Mitte eigenartig hervor: eine gewaltige Linse auf einem Gestell. Sie fing die dünnen Sonnenstrahlen ein, die durch die Schlitze in der Decke drangen und den halberleuchteten Raum durchquerten.
languages.original_text: Bulky power transformers, cogitators, crates, and vox-casters took up most of the space. Against their background, the structure in the centre stood out oddly: an enormous lens mounted on a stand. It caught the thin sunbeams that made their way through slits in the ceiling and crossed the half-lit room.

traits.locale_text: Klobige Stromtransformatoren, Cogitatoren, Kisten und Vox-Transmitter belegten fast die gesamte Fläche. Vor diesem Hintergrund stach das Gebilde in der Mitte eigenartig hervor: eine gewaltige Linse auf einem Gestell. Sie fing die dünnen Sonnenstrahlen ein, die durch die Schlitze in der Decke drangen und den halberleuchteten Raum durchquerten.

languages.text: D'imposants transformateurs électriques, des cogitateurs, des caisses et des émetteurs vox occupent l'essentiel de l'espace. Devant, la structure au centre détone étrangement : une étrange lentille montée sur un pied. Elle capte les fins rayons de soleil qui passent entre les fentes du plafond et traversent la pièce plongée dans la pénombre.
languages.original_text: Bulky power transformers, cogitators, crates, and vox-casters took up most of the space. Against their background, the structure in the centre stood out oddly: an enormous lens mounted on a stand. It caught the thin sunbeams that made their way through slits in the ceiling and crossed the half-lit room.

traits.locale_text: D'imposants transformateurs électriques, des cogitateurs, des caisses et des émetteurs-vox occupent l'essentiel de l'espace. Devant, la structure au centre détone étrangement : une étrange lentille montée sur un pied. Elle capte les fins rayons de soleil qui passent entre les fentes du plafond et traversent la pièce plongée dans la pénombre.

languages.text: 笨重的变电器、沉思者、板条箱和通讯器占据了大部分空间，但房间中间的造物与周围的一切格格不入。那是一架安装在支架上的巨大透镜。微弱的阳光从天花板缝隙里射进来，经过透镜反射，穿过了半明半暗的房间。
languages.original_text: Bulky power transformers, cogitators, crates, and vox-casters took up most of the space. Against their background, the structure in the centre stood out oddly: an enormous lens mounted on a stand. It caught the thin sunbeams that made their way through slits in the ceiling and crossed the half-lit room.

traits.locale_text: 笨重的变电器、思考器、板条箱和通讯器占据了大部分空间，但房间中间的造物与周围的一切格格不入。那是一架安装在支架上的巨大透镜。微弱的阳光从天花板缝隙里射进来，经过透镜反射，穿过了半明半暗的房间。

languages.text: 大きな電力変圧器、考算機、木箱、音声通信送受信装置が、その空間の大半を占めていた。それらを背景に、中央の構造物は妙に際立っていた。スタンドには巨大なレンズが取り付けられている。天井の隙間から差し込む細い太陽光線がこれに集まり、半分だけ明るくなった部屋を横切っている。
languages.original_text: Bulky power transformers, cogitators, crates, and vox-casters took up most of the space. Against their background, the structure in the centre stood out oddly: an enormous lens mounted on a stand. It caught the thin sunbeams that made their way through slits in the ceiling and crossed the half-lit room.

traits.locale_text: 大きな電力変圧器、考算機、木箱、音声通信送受信装置が、その空間の大半を占めていた。それらを背景に、中央の構造物は妙に際立っていた。スタンドには巨大なレンズが取り付けられている。天井の隙間から差し込む細い太陽光線がこれに集まり、半分だけ明るくなった部屋を横切っている。

languages.text: Los grandes transformadores de potencia, los cogitadores, las cajas y los voco amplificadores ocupaban la mayor parte del espacio. Sobre el fondo, la estructura del centro destacaba de forma extraña: una enorme lente montada sobre un soporte. Atrapaba los finos rayos de sol que se abrían paso por las rendijas del techo y cruzaban la habitación en penumbra.
languages.original_text: Bulky power transformers, cogitators, crates, and vox-casters took up most of the space. Against their background, the structure in the centre stood out oddly: an enormous lens mounted on a stand. It caught the thin sunbeams that made their way through slits in the ceiling and crossed the half-lit room.

traits.locale_text: Los grandes transformadores de potencia, los cogitadores, las cajas y los voco amplificadores ocupaban la mayor parte del espacio. Sobre el fondo, la estructura del centro destacaba de forma extraña: una enorme lente montada sobre un soporte. Atrapaba los finos rayos de sol que se abrían paso por las rendijas del techo y cruzaban la habitación en penumbra.

languages.text: Koca koca güç trafoları, kavramsayarlar, kasalar ve voksyayarlar, alanın çoğunu kaplıyordu. Arkalarında, merkezdeki yapı garip bir şekilde göze çarpıyordu. Kaideye oturtulmuş devasa bir mercekti bu. Tavandaki yarıklardan girip yarı aydınlık odayı geçen ince güneş ışınlarını yakalıyordu.
languages.original_text: Bulky power transformers, cogitators, crates, and vox-casters took up most of the space. Against their background, the structure in the centre stood out oddly: an enormous lens mounted on a stand. It caught the thin sunbeams that made their way through slits in the ceiling and crossed the half-lit room.

traits.locale_text: Koca koca güç trafoları, kavramsayarlar, kasalar ve voksyayarlar, alanın çoğunu kaplıyordu. Arkalarında, merkezdeki yapı garip bir şekilde göze çarpıyordu. Kaideye oturtulmuş devasa bir mercekti bu. Tavandaki yarıklardan girip yarı aydınlık odayı geçen ince güneş ışınlarını yakalıyordu.
